column5: Very nice and nice fish Roy, congrats to you and Missus.  Cheers, 1leg
You could have fish and chips for a year with those.LOL j/k  Nice fish there and nice smiles  TFS Roy
Congrats to Jeanne on that great lookin' ski.  What does she think about having her face on the internets?
Nice fish! I was gonna mention the same thing as Misfish... I though smiles were only allowed on shore! LOL Great pics and smiles! HH
She doesn't mind, Doug. She says Marc's face helps balance out the pic.
That's just awesome Roy.  I'm so glad J got her musky.  Way to go  Joey
Great results Roy.  WTG
Congrats on a successful outing, Roy & Mrs. Roy, those are beautiful fish with great colours...  Mike
Great muskies Roy, WTG!  2 great fish in a few hours doesn't surprize me fishing with Marc.  He is the muskie man!  Aaron
Nice way to spend a few hours.  Congrats to J on her first musky!!
awsome fish nice pics
beauties Roy!@
Nice Slimers roy you have a great guide and friend there with you congratz on a great day out

J and I had the pleasure of spending a few hours on the river with Marc Thorpe on Saturday night. It was a great evening, a little wind but comfy. We had two rods in the water and were trolling at about 5mph with perch coloured baits. We launched at 5:15PM and returned at 8:15. The final score was 2-2. Two solid rips but were unable to get a hookset. We were more fortunate with the two other rips. J got the first (and largest) fish of the evening and like a trooper, brought the fish in herself. I got the next one, a smaller fish but a great specimen all the same. We didn't bother sticking (measuring) the fish but J's was a decent size. J and I would like to thank Marc for a wonderful evening and all the knowledge. If anyone has a chance to fish with Marc, do it.
Thanks Roy! Boated two fish in just three hours I say that is fantastic. Both fish look great.  Whopper
wonderfull
NICE SKI'S !! WTG GUYZ!
Nice! Those are 2 healthy looking specimen and in only 3 hours to boot!

That is definitely on my top five things to do is fish with Marc. (And soon)  The man does nothing but catch lots of big fish day in day out.  Nice fish Roy. Good to actually see that mug of yours again. Been way too long.  Speed
Very nice fish Roy...I bet your proud J seeing as she caught that fish all on her own....She is a trooper for sure.....

WTG Roy, congrats to you & the Mrs. !!!!  I've been away for a couple weeks and just got home a few hours ago, and seeing you & J with those 2 beauties is a nice way for me to get back in the groove on OFC.  Marc never fails to put folks on bigguns
WTG Roy!!!  That's still something I want to catch this year...a decent sized muskie!!  Great looking fish and great report.  Thanks!
WTG-glad you had a good time
wtg couple nice fish there
Very Very nice Roy.  I can only imagine the info you picked up during the time on the water.  LUCKY BUM !!!!!
Sounds fantastic Roy, just about a perfect evening and decent fish as well. I think just about anyone myself included would jump at the chance to fish with Mr. Thorpe, you're very lucky!
Very nice Roy and J. Love the pic of you with the sun lighting up the tail of the fish. Thanks..
I really like the look of those fish Roy.  WTG.
very nice looking fish!
Those are two really nice looking Muskies!
Thanks guys. I appreciate the kind remarks.
Some great looking fish there, Roy!  WTG!!  dk
Wow !  Thanks for sharing Roy, Marc is definitely THE Ottawa river man when it comes to 'skis !!!!

Ah Roy,a wonderfull evening with you and J,we tied the game up with the beast,but I suppose they got win some too. Tks for spending a few hours Saturday and Sunday with me,glad we got J her first muskie Anyone one who's ever had supper at Roy's knows what kind of spread Roy and J put out,kinna nice seing two good people receive after so much giving
Absolutely Marc,  I too have had the pleasure of dining at Chez Boudreau.  J also sent me home with a jar of the finest homemade zuchinni relish I've ever eaten
Nice fish, great report, thanks for sharing.  John
looks like a fun evening!  Cheers!
Excellent fishies Roy.   Good to see Marc finally got a haircut!  Only queation I have is where are the Steeples?  As for the supper thing, we may have to stop by on the return trip too.
